llm_command:
kubectl apply -n currencyservice -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: deny-adservice-to-currencyservice
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currencyservice
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: adservice
    ports:
    - port: 7000
      protocol: TCP
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
EOF
